data.title: Liesel Matthews
data.meta_description: Liesel Matthews. Actress: Little Princess - Die kleine Prinzessin. Liesel Matthews was born on 14 March 1984 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. She is an actress, known for Little Princess - Die kleine Prinzessin (1995), Air Force One (1997) and Blast (2000). She is married to Ian Simmons.
data.text:
Her stage name is the result of a vicious custody battle between her parents. When Little Princess - Die kleine Prinzessin (1995) was released she was supposed to be listed with her real last name, Pritzker-Bagley (she added the name Bagley after her mother remarried). However, her father insisted that she be listed as simply Liesel Pritzker and threatened to keep her from being in the film if his request was not honored. She took the last name Matthews after her brother Matthew's name.

The Pritzker family owns Hyatt, a chain that owns or operates 207 hotels worldwide. The family also controls industrial companies, real estate, Royal Carribean Cruise Lines, banks, mining, railroads and the TransUnion credit bureau. The family is said to control a fortune worth more than $15 billion. They have been near the top of Forbes magazine's "America's Richest Families" list since the magazine began in 1982.

Liesel and her husband Ian now live in New York with their daughters. Today Lisel Matthews runs Blue Haven Initiative with Ian. She co-runs The IimPact. Liesel has retired from film acting. She now focuses on business management and stage acting. Liesel married Ian Simmons in 2011.
